lines.text: Seriously, man. It's not that hard.
What isn't? You really think this all ties together?
Yeah, man! There was a spell for the hole, a spell for the pulse...
But the blood- well, they didn't need a spell for that one.
What? You think they somehow put his blood all over the floor without magic?
Who's to say it's <c=#FF00FF>his</c> blood? They've got a half-empty bottle of the stuff sitting right there, don't they?
Wha... half-empty? The extra-virgin virgin's blood?
Or half-full. Depends on your perspective.
But yeah! That puddle of blood is store-bought, not homemade!
Not that your whole theory isn't entirely bonkers, but you've got one.
Bonkers? Pay attention, Leo! It fits the evidence!
Well, I'll be darned. You're not wrong.
And you know what? We can verify this one.
Let's just wrap up the rest of this, and then we'll see about closin' the case.
